Package bRigid

Interface Summary
BInterface  
 

Class Summary
BBox Box as rigidBody
BCompound CollisionShape as Compound of multiple shapes.
BConvexHull ConvexHull as rigidBody, List of vertices, PShapes or .obj files as input and calculates its convexHull for collisionDetection
BForce linear force
BForceAttraction Attractor force
BForceAttractionLocal attraction force for local behaviors, add on Objects
BForceLocalSwarm  
BGImpactMesh ConvexHull as rigidBody, List of vertices, PShapes or .obj files as input and calculates its convexHull for collisionDetection
BJoint6DofC Generic6DofConstraint between two rigidbodies each with a pivot point that descibes the axis location in local space.
BJointHinge Hinge constraint between two rigid bodies each with a pivot point that descibes the axis location in local space.
BJointNail Point to point constraint between two rigid bodies each with a pivot point that descibes the "ballsocket" location in local space.
BJointSlider Slider constraint between two rigid bodies allows the body to rotate around one axis and translate along this axis.
BObject BObject is the basic RigidBody Object, all other RigidBodies extend BObject and inherent all attributes ConstructionInfo by Richard Brauer -- http://www.r6753.com
BPhysics solver class, physics world; the BPhysics class acts like a container; every rigid object or spring should be added here thanks to the examples of Giulio Piacentino and Richard Brauer jBullet is a Java port of Bullet (c) 2008 Martin Dvorak http://jbullet.advel.cz/ ; Bullet Continuous Collision Detection and Physics Library (c) 2003-2008 Erwin Coumans http://www.bulletphysics.com/ bRigid written by Daniel Koehler - 2013 www.lab-eds.org - for feedback please contact me at: daniel@lab-eds.org
BPlane infinite non-moving (static) collision plane.
BSphere Sphere as rigidBody
BTerrain static BvhTriangleMeshShape integrated as noisy Terrain. tShape method by Richard Brauer
